t:type.name: UserBehavior
t:type.t:description: Represents a single entry in a user_behavior table

t:attribute.name: id
t:attribute.description: The platform-owned identifier for the user/person

t:attribute.name: lastMobileForeground
t:attribute.description: The last datetime mobile app was foregrounded

t:attribute.name: lastPINUsage
t:attribute.description: The last datetime pin was used

t:attribute.name: lastNotification
t:attribute.description: The last datetime notification was sent
